mapper.sql: sid, product_sid, channel_sid, category_sid, category_name, category_type,prop_sid, prop_name, value_sid, value_name
mapper.select: SELECT ppp.* FROM pcm_category AS cate JOIN pcm_product_parameters ppp ON cate.sid = ppp.category_sid JOIN pcm_product AS spu ON spu.sid = ppp.product_sid where spu.product_sid = #{spuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cate.channel_sid = #{channelSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT ppp.product_sid * 100000 + ppp.category_sid AS spuCateSid, ppp.product_sid AS spuSid, ppp.channel_sid AS channelSid, ppp.category_sid AS categorySid, ppp.category_name AS categoryName, ppp.category_type AS categoryType, ppp.prop_sid AS propSid, ppp.prop_name AS propName, ppp.value_sid AS valueSid, ppp.value_name AS valueName, pcpv.not_null AS notNull FROM pcm_product_parameters AS ppp JOIN pcm_category_prop_values AS pcpv ON ppp.category_sid = pcpv.category_sid AND ppp.prop_sid = pcpv.props_sid and ppp.category_type = 3
product_sid = #{spuSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from pcm_product_parameters where product_sid = #{productSid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and channel_sid = #{channelSid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and category_sid =#{categorySid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into pcm_product_parameters (sid, product_sid, channel_sid, category_sid, category_name, prop_sid, prop_name, value_sid, value_name ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categorySid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{valueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into pcm_product_parameters
sid,
product_sid,
channel_sid,
category_sid,

category_type,

mapper.update:
update pcm_product_parameters
product_sid = #{productSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channel_sid = #{channelSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category_sid = #{categorySid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prop_sid = #{propSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
prop_name = #{propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value_sid = #{valueSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
value_name = #{valueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pcm_product_parameters set product_sid = #{productSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channel_sid = #{channelSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, category_sid = #{categorySid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prop_sid = #{propSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, prop_name = #{propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_sid = #{valueSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, value_name = #{valueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select shop_name from v_ssd_product_stock_price where product_sid = #{productSid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by shop_name
